# Deprecated keys favorites.dataSpace.title=Data # Live table additional keys favorites.default.actions_edit=Edit Default Favorites favorites.user.addCurrentPage=Add this page favorites.user.addCurrentPage.alreadyExists=Page already exists in favorites. favorites.user.addRemoveOperation.fail=Failed to update favorites. favorites.user.addCurrentPage.success=Page added to favorites. favorites.user.removeCurrentPage.success=Page removed from favorites. favorites.user.removeCurrentPage.doesntExist=The page is not in the list of favorites. favorites.user.actions_edit=Manage Favorites favorites.user.tools_access=Access Favorites favorites.user.updateProfile=Favorite pages updated. favorites.form.save_button_text=Save

# User profile favorites.userprofile.menu=My Favorites
# Help favorites.help.description=Welcome to the Favorites administration. To activate Favorites you need to either add the Favorites.Code.FavoritesPanel to your list of panels, or to add Favorites.Code.FavoritesMenu as an include in your Menu. Below you can edit the default list of Favorites.
# More option menu button favorites.moreOptions.add=Add to favorites favorites.moreOptions.remove=Remove from favorites
# Macro rendering.macro.favorites.name=Favorites rendering.macro.favorites.description=List all favorite pages of a user
